Event.EventArg: [\x01]CREATECG|侵攻図|グラフィック\ビジュアル\一枚絵\侵攻図01.gal|NORMAL|#1|C|T|900|1|0|0|0||1
The northern continent is the land of humans.
[\x01]CREATECG|侵攻図2|グラフィック\ビジュアル\一枚絵\侵攻図01.lcm|WAIT|#1|C|B|1000|1|0|0|0||1
Far to the south, however, lies the Land of Darkness, the domain
of monsters. A great sea lies between the two, and neither land
needed to concern itself with the other, until recently.
[\x01]CREATECG|侵攻図2|グラフィック\ビジュアル\一枚絵\侵攻図02.lcm|NORMAL|#1|C|B|1000|1|0|0|0||1
Some years ago, the demonic hordes finally crossed the great sea.
Led by the Dark Kings, they laid waste to entire countries…
[\x01]CREATECG|侵攻図2|グラフィック\ビジュアル\一枚絵\侵攻図03.lcm|WAIT|#1|C|B|1000|1|0|0|0||1
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】考える.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"…Last year, the kingdom I called my home was also overrun.
Both my parents were killed, and… I've been told that my
little sister is being held prisoner."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】真面目.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
"Lady Demea… our people need your help.
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"I see. So that's why you're here.

"While I slept, my power was scattered across the land.
There's almost none left in this temporary body. I would be no
match for the Dark King and his forces in my current form."
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")

DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア手伸ばし怒り.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
"Humans… always taking the easy way out. Thinking they can
be saved, just by sacrificing one little girl.
Believing that throwing your life away will somehow convince
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情怒】怒り.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
Everyone is fighting desperately… even though… even though
they don't stand a chance! So many people have died already…
They sent me here as their last hope!"
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常不機嫌.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常無表情.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
To save not just yourself, but the whole world…
Are you prepared to sacrifice your very soul?"
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】普通.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
To save everyone, are you prepared not only to sacrifice
yourself… but to face eternal torment?"
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】困る.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常ニヤリ.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Too much to ask, then. I thought as much."

[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
On the western edge of the mountain range, two figures emerge
from a small cave opening. Following a steep mountain path,
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"I had no idea you could get all the way over here from
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"Yes, the path is a well-kept secret.
People knowing about it would have been troublesome."
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア手伸ばし悲哀.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
"From now on, I'll be following you around like a ghost.
I'll only help when you're in real danger. You must train
yourself, until you're able to face the Dark King."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】真面目.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","001★★★主人公.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"But how can I ever do that?
People have always looked after me.
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
DBDirectGetStr("DB名前代替","画像","002★★★デメア.gal",FALSE,FALSE,"文字列","")
"You've been given the powers of a Sacrificial Princess: you're
closer to a spirit than a human. Spirits are not limited by their
body, but by their willpower. You are now much more powerful than
a normal human, but you must become more powerful yet."
"In the eyes of a spirit or a demon, there's little
difference between a strong human and a weak one."
"By shedding your mortality, there is practically no limit to
how powerful you can become. With proper training, you will
be able to far surpass any human being."
Few have the inner strength to do what is needed."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】困る.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0

Kids these days, they lack guts."

"You have been granted the powers of a Sacrificial Princess.
Should you fall in combat, your life force will be preserved,
and your lost body parts will regenerate. You need not fear
You have the power to excite the urges of humans and
monsters alike. Any creature with lustful instincts can be
made a slave to their own desires."
[\x01]CREATECG|NPC|グラフィック\NPC\デメア\デメア通常閉じ目.gal|NORMAL|#1|L|B|100|1|0|0|0||1
By absorbing the semen of your target, you can gain their
powers and abilities. Whenever you are raped by an enemy,
their seed may grant you new strength."
[\x01]CHANGECG|表情|グラフィック\キャラ\立ち\表情\立ち【表情普】とまどい.gal|NORMAL|1|0|0|0||0

"Like I said. I can help you, but you're the one who will be
crawling through filth. From here on out, you will be
violated by revolting monsters and lawless men. Repeatedly."
"You must endure shame and suffering that would kill or break
any ordinary person, and keep on fighting to reach victory."
